Text: Thank you for a pleasurable interviewhtmldiv stylebackgroundcolorDIV DIV DIV DIV DIV DIV DIV DIV DIVFONT sizeRebecca ChanFONTDIV DIVFONT size Arlon TrailFONTDIV DIVFONT sizeHouston TX FONTDIV DIVFONT size FONTDIV DIVnbspDIV DIVFONT sizeDear Ms Mary S FischerFONTDIV DIVnbspDIV DIVFONT sizenbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp It was a pleasure meeting you I enjoyed learning more about Enron strong commitment to innovation employee satisfaction and productivity I particularly impressed by the professionalism and dedication that you and Enron staff exhibited After talking with you I am firmly committed to and excited by the prospect of a careernbspin EnronFONTDIV DIVnbspDIV DIVFONT sizenbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp Based on our discussion it seems that you are seeking an individual who shares your vision and is open to implementing creative and adaptive to changes I share your vision and I am interested in the excellent opportunity to work on a variety of challenging projects with team in Tax Department I believe that my academic training in UH and my experience working in Transpak and Look Ease qualify me for the position One of my greatest strengths is an ability to motivatenbspstaff to strive for excellence and to work together to achieve common goals FONTDIV DIVnbspDIV DIVFONT sizenbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp Thank you for your time and consideration Inbsplook forward to hearing from you soon FONTDIV DIVnbspDIV P classMsoNormalFONT sizeSincerely YoursFONTP P classMsoNormalFONT sizeRebecca ChanFONTP P classMsoNormalnbspPDIVDIVDIVDIVDIVDIVDIVDIVdivbr clearallhrGet your FREE download of MSN Explorer at a hrefbqlhmtagitlENaspabrhtml
